synopsis.text: There's a fresh start in the air as Kumiko Oumae steps into Kitauji High School, eager to leave her past behind. She reunites with her old bandmate, Reina Kousaka, and befriends Hazuki Katou and Sapphire Kawashima, who are eager to join the school's brass band club. Kumiko, still haunted by a past incident involving Reina at a middle school competition, hesitates to join. As the club strives to reach new heights under their new advisor, Noboru Taki, Kumiko must confront her past and find the courage to seize this new opportunity. Amidst the chaos, a beautiful harmony of friendship, rivalry, and self-discovery begins to unfold in this captivating tale of high school musicians.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
